alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 04 at 3:38PM CST until January 05 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Clay and Union Counties. In Iowa, Ida, Woodbury, Plymouth, Cherokee and Buena Vista Counties. In Nebraska, Dakota and Dixon Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A short burst of light snow is possible later this evening and could briefly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
